# Who are the individuals that work in accounting?

### Big 5 Personality Traits of Accountants (Control: Professionals)
``` {r accountantsProfBig5, results="asis"}
var_names <- var_names_accountants_big5
tab <- tab_acc_prof_YearFE_big5$table
tab[12] <- paste(
  "\\\\[-1.8ex] &", var_names$label[1], 
  "&", var_names$label[2], 
  "&", var_names$label[3], 
  "&", var_names$label[4],
  "&", var_names$label[5],"\\\\"
)
esc_var_names <- str_replace_all(var_names$var_name, fixed ("_"), "\\_")
reg_names <- tibble(
  var_name = esc_var_names[c(6:10)],
  label = var_names$label[c(6:10)]
)
for (i in seq(15, 27, by = 3)) {
  pos <- (i-12)/3
  tab[i] <- str_replace(
    tab[i], fixed(reg_names$var_name[pos]), reg_names$label[pos]
  )
}
latex_tab <- c(
  "\\begin{center}",
  "\\resizebox*{!}{0.8\\textheight}{",
  "\\begin{tabular}{lccccc}",
  tab[8:39],
  "\\end{tabular}}",
  "\\end{center}"
)
cat(paste(latex_tab, collapse = "\n"))
```
